languages.text: "Глядите-ка, ксеносы, что б их ажи сожрали, уже ходят среди людей!" {n}Джай склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Вы разве не мните себя выше того? Но только сути это не меняет — в подружки к Вьятт затесалась ксенос, а не мутант".

traits.locale_text: "Глядите-ка, маадари, что б их дивы сожрали, уже ходят среди людей!" {n}Джай прищуривает один глаз и склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Хотя знаешь... обычно маадари как немочь — тощие и бледные, а эта поглаже и повеселее как будто. Видать, губернатор изволила откормить".

languages.text: "Would you look at this! Xenos — azhi devour them — mingling with humans!" {n}Jae tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Don't your lot think themselves above that? Anyway, it doesn't change the fact that it's a xenos that's been cosying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."
languages.original_text: "Глядите-ка, ксеносы, что б их ажи сожрали, уже ходят среди людей!" {n}Джай склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Вы разве не мните себя выше того? Но только сути это не меняет — в подружки к Вьятт затесалась ксенос, а не мутант".

traits.locale_text: "Get a load of this, the maadari — divs devour 'em — are mingling with the humans!" {n}Jae squints with one eye and tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Actually, you know what? Your regular maadari have got a sickly look about 'em — all skinny and pale, but this one here's got a bit of meat on her bones, she's easier on the eye somehow. But that doesn't change facts — it's a xenos that's been cozying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

"Get a load of this, the maadari — divs devour 'em — are mingling with the humans!" {n}Jae squints with one eye and tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Actually, you know what? Your regular maadari have got a sickly look about 'em — all skinny and pale, but this one here's got a bit of meat on her bones, she's easier on the eye somehow. But that doesn't change facts — it's a xenos that's been cozying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

"Get a load of this, the maadari — divs devour 'em — are mingling with the humans!" {n}Jae squints with one eye and tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Actually, you know what? Your regular maadari have got a sickly look about 'em — all skinny and pale, but this one here's got a bit of meat on her bones, she's easier on the eye somehow. But that doesn't change facts — it's a xenos that's been cozying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

"Would you look at this! Xenos — azhi devour them — mingling with humans!" {n}Jae tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Don't your lot think themselves above that? Anyway, it doesn't change the fact that it's a xenos that's been cosying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

languages.text: “快看！是异形！他们居然混迹于人类之中，愿鬼怪吞噬他们！”{n}婕伊将头歪向一侧。{/n}“你们这些异形，不是总觉得自己高高在上吗？总之，无论如何，都改变不了这个事实——她并不是什么变种人，而是个异形，打算向维亚特示好。”
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this! Xenos — azhi devour them — mingling with humans!" {n}Jae tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Don't your lot think themselves above that? Anyway, it doesn't change the fact that it's a xenos that's been cosying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

traits.locale_text: “快看！是异形！他们居然混迹于人类之中，愿鬼怪吞噬他们！”{n}婕伊眯起了一只眼睛，将头歪向一侧。{/n}“说真的，你知道吗？普通异型的样子看起来往往很病态，浑身苍白，骨瘦如柴。不过，这个异形的骨头上还挺有肉的，外观好像也比普通的异形更漂亮。但即便如此，也改变不了这个事实：她也是个打算向维亚特示好的异形，不是什么变种人。”

languages.text: «¡Lo que hay que ver! ¡Xenos (que los azhi los devoren) mezclándose con humanos!». {n}Jae inclina la cabeza a un lado.{/n} «Pensaba que los tuyos se consideraban demasiado buenos para interactuar con nosotros. En cualquier caso, eso no cambia el hecho de que es una xenos lo que se ha estado acercando a Vyatt, no una mutante».
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this! Xenos — azhi devour them — mingling with humans!" {n}Jae tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Don't your lot think themselves above that? Anyway, it doesn't change the fact that it's a xenos that's been cosying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lo que hay que ver! ¡Xenos (que azhi los devore) mezclándose con humanos!». {n}Jae entrecierra un ojo e inclina la cabeza a un lado.{/n} «¿Sabes qué? Los xenos típicos suelen tener una apariencia enfermiza, delgaduchos y pálidos, pero esta tiene carne en los huesos. Es más guapa. Pero eso no cambia el hecho de que es una xenos lo que se ha estado acercando a Vyatt, no una mutante».

languages.text: 「おやおや！異種族じゃあないかい…アジーに飲み込まれてしまえばいいのに…人間の仲間入りとは！」{n}ジェイは首を傾げる。{/n}「あんたら、お高く止まってなかったかい？何にせよ、ビャットに取り入ろうとしてたのは変異体じゃなくて異種族、って事実は変わらないさ」
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this! Xenos — azhi devour them — mingling with humans!" {n}Jae tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Don't your lot think themselves above that? Anyway, it doesn't change the fact that it's a xenos that's been cosying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

traits.locale_text: 「おやおや！異種族じゃあないかい…アジーに飲み込まれてしまえばいいのに…人間の仲間入りとは！」{n}ジェイは首を傾げる。{/n}「あんたら、お高く止まってなかったかい？何にせよ、ビャットに取り入ろうとしてたのは変異体じゃなくて異種族、って事実は変わらないさ」

languages.text: "Seht Euch das an! Xenos – Azhi verschlinge sie – unter Menschen!" {n}Jae legt den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Hält sich Euresgleichen nicht für etwas Besseres? Aber egal, das das ändert nichts daran, dass sich eine Xenos bei Vyatt eingeschlichen hat, keine Mutantin."
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this! Xenos — azhi devour them — mingling with humans!" {n}Jae tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Don't your lot think themselves above that? Anyway, it doesn't change the fact that it's a xenos that's been cosying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

traits.locale_text: "Nun sieh sich das einer an! Eine Xenos – Azhi verschlinge sie – unter Menschen! {n}Jae kneift ein Auge zu und legt den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Wisst Ihr was? Normale Xenos wirken immer etwas kränklich, dünn und blass, aber dieses Exemplar hat durchaus Fleisch auf den Knochen, und sie ist irgendwie hübscher. Doch das ändert nichts daran, dass sich eine Xenos bei Vyatt eingeschlichen hat, keine Mutantin."

languages.text: « Regardez-moi ça ! Une xénos, que les azhi la dévorent, qui cohabite avec des humains ! Je croyais que les vôtres ne s'abaissaient pas à ce genre de fréquentations, {n}remarque Jae en penchant la tête sur le côté.{/n} Bref, quoi qu'il en soit, ça ne change pas le fait que c'est une xénos qui fait ami-ami avec Vyatt, pas une mutante. »
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this! Xenos — azhi devour them — mingling with humans!" {n}Jae tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Don't your lot think themselves above that? Anyway, it doesn't change the fact that it's a xenos that's been cosying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

traits.locale_text: « Regardez-moi ça ! Une xénos, que les azhi la dévore, qui cohabite avec des humains ! » {n}Jae plisse un œil et penche la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Une minute... La plupart des xénos ont tendance à avoir un air un peu maladif, ils sont souvent maigres et pâlichons, mais celle-ci a une silhouette plus harmonieuse. Je dirais même qu'elle est plutôt jolie. Enfin, ça ne change pas le fait que c'est une xénos qui fait ami-ami avec Vyatt, pas une mutante. »

languages.original_text: "Would you look at this! Xenos — azhi devour them — mingling with humans!" {n}Jae tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Don't your lot think themselves above that? Anyway, it doesn't change the fact that it's a xenos that's been cosying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

languages.text: "Bak sen şu işe! Azhi tüketesice zenolar, insanlarla içli dışlı olur olmuş!" {n}Jae başını yana yatırıyor.{/n} "Hiç yakıştıramadım, insan nasıl yakıştırabilir ki zaten? Hâle bak, Vyatt'a sırnaşan şey bir mutant değil bir zeno çıktı."
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this! Xenos — azhi devour them — mingling with humans!" {n}Jae tilts her head to the side.{/n} "Don't your lot think themselves above that? Anyway, it doesn't change the fact that it's a xenos that's been cosying up to Vyatt, not a mutant."

traits.locale_text: "Bak sen şu işe! Azhi tüketesice zenolar, insanlarla içli dışlı olur olmuş!" {n}Jae başını yana yatırıyor.{/n} "Hiç yakıştıramadım, insan nasıl yakıştırabilir ki zaten? Hâle bak, Vyatt'a sırnaşan şey bir mutant değil bir zeno çıktı."
